0.1.3.name: wordpress/happiness-today
0.1.3.description:
Displays inspirational random quotes on your Admin pages to bring happiness and fulfillment while you work.

In the style of the ubiquitous Hello Dolly plugin, Happiness Today is built using the Pods CMS plugin and Pods Plugin Builder as an example of basic Pods ease-of-use.

It is supplied with the lyrics for Think Of Happiness Today, shared under a Creative Commons licence by Soft Charisma, and 3 relevant links, all of which can be easily customized. You could use a different song, or install on your client sites with sales messages and support links. The possibilities are endless.

Happiness Today requires Pods CMS plugin, Pods UI, and
